entry.title: WIND WARNING , Chipman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Doaktown 2:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

Humidity: 91 %

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with freezing rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near noon. Rain or freezing rain early this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 11 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending before morning then partly cloudy. Risk of a thundershower this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening and dissipating overnight. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to 11 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
